item.description:
NHCer/professional pianist Alexis will be accompanying 2 amazing professional singers, Tiffany Jackson (soprano), recently returned from performances in Europe, and Albert Lee (tenor), as they perform a variety of opera arias, art songs, songs from Broadway, and spirituals. 7-9pm at the Center Church on the Green. $20.

We may be going out for drinks or something afterwards.

If you want to put this Event on your facebook calendar, click here

HOST: Alexis, cell 203-747-9203...probably best to text her...she'll be teaching all day and may be unable to answer the phone before the concert, but may be able to reply to text messages.
I (Jason) plan to be there, you can reach me at 203-901-4957. Call or text.

You can hear Alexis at her professional sites:
www.facebook.com/pages/Alexis-Zingale/41532426738 (this is her professional page, not her regular profile)
www.myspace.com/alexiszingalepianist

DIRECTIONS: For directions, click here

PARKING: It's a Friday night in downtown, I don't know if the bars get going that early (I'm guessing not). If they do, be prepared that any street parking won't be close. Or park in the Temple Street garage
item.name: Fri. 6/26 - Arias, art songs, musicals, spirituals, and Alexis
